title: Steam fixed Denuvo bypass
body:
Denuvo blocked the activation method we used. So now you can’t activate any games anymore. However, as long as you are offline you can play until the activation breaks. Enjoy it while you can.
Royalgamer06 from REVOLT Team

I can confirm it, tried on several games.

So I’m postponing all Denuvo repacks until more valid cracks appear.

I will repack (but won’t publish) them in background mode, now I can breath slowly 🙂
